thread.title: The Arrival of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter
thread.title_full: The Arrival of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter

title: The Arrival of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter
text: The Arrival of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter Of late, Moben Global Inc. has surprisingly pushed out another revolutionary product, the siting-posture electric scooter K3. China, 21 September 2015 -- Subsequent to the arrival of FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter V9, FOSJOAS rolled out another model U3, the upgraded version of V9. FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter U3 leaves Moben Global Inc. at its height of two-wheeled scooter. Of late, Moben Global Inc. has surprisingly pushed out another revolutionary product, the siting-posture electric scooter K3. K3 is diametrically different from all previous models. FOSJOAS K3 differs from other products firstly in its riding mode. FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter K3 adopts the sitting-posture mode. When the rider steer FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter K3, he could as ride as sit on the leather saddle. The height of leather saddle are installed in a perfect way, which offers a comfortable ride. Months ago, scooter-lovers used to harp up on about the fatigue caused by the long-time standing rode. Once they cycled for hours at stretch, the increasing fit of fatigue would abate the enjoyment of ride. After the arrival of K3, the reverse is true. From the perspective of riding mode, K3 is a veritable revolution in the sector throughout the whole history of scooter.In addition, it is, too, worth noting that FOSJOAS two-wheeled intelligent scooter K3 can be connected into the user’s mobile phone via APP. The dedicated APP of FOSJOAS is available to download online for nothing. As for the modern city dwellers, purchase, reading and music etc. has been familiar to them long before. It seems that one is able to live merely via his mobile phone. The inevitable trend is taking shape that the mobile phone is to dominate the life of modern city dwellers. FOSJOAS naturally smelt it and got to realise the trend. Therefore, in FOSJOAS, lots of time and asset went on the R & D of the scooter able to connect the mobile phone via APP. Years’ effort finally bore fruit. FOSJOAS was proud to unveil the long-expected scooter to the public. # # #
